name: Scoyfe's Mire
tagline: Trees are shaggy with yellow, hanging mosses. Visibility is low, with vapours hanging at head level.
description: Trees are shaggy with yellow, hanging mosses. Visibility is low, with vapours hanging at head level.

points_of_interest.name: Noisome Pond
points_of_interest.description: In the north of this hex, the ground slopes downward to a waterlogged region of puddles and tussocks. In a dim and damp glade sits a pond, about 35′ across, completely covered in lily pads. Around its edges are many diseased-looking orange flowers, all facing into the centre of the water.
points_of_interest.interior: Rising Scoyfe: Anyone dallying at the pond soon sees a bizarre pair of figures arise slowly from the centre, known in local legend as The Scoyfe. The pair bellow in anger and attack intruders, pursuing them for up to a mile if they flee. Treasure horde: Scattered about the bottom of the pond is 1,000gp, mostly near a submerged, rotten, burst sack.
special_features: Treasure horde: 1,000gp scattered on pond bottom

points_of_interest.name: The Hoary Gate
points_of_interest.description: At the centre of this hex stand two 10′ pillars of glistening ice, crackling with hoarfrost. The 5′ aperture between the pillars is filled with a swirling, chill mist.
points_of_interest.entering: Stepping between the pillars: Whisks one away to the Prince's Road (see Fairy Roads, p26).

npcs.name: The Scoyfe
npcs.description: A pair of corpse-like men, one riding on the other's back, both draped in lilies and foul mire water. Though the two appear to be in conflict, they act in unison.
desires: To fight each other over gold
secrets: In life, the two were bandits who killed each other arguing over a sack of gold
npcs.stat_reference: Upper Being: Level 3 AC 13 HP 15, Lower Being: Level 5 AC 13 HP 26

dm_notes: Undead: Immune to biological effects (e.g. disease, poison) and mind-affecting spells (e.g. Vapours of Dream, Paralysation, Dominate). Immunities: Only harmed by magic, silver weapons, or magic weapons. Eternal grudge: 1-in-6 chance per Round that the two fall to attacking each other, vanishing in a puff of stringy ectoplasm. Return from death: Can only be permanently defeated if the corpses of both beings are incinerated. Otherwise, both re-manifest in the pond at midnight.
